text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) zai-org/Open-AutoGLM | 97% | stars now 13322 → est 38352 (range 38302-38402)
   https://github.com/zai-org/Open-AutoGLM
2) mistralai/mistral-vibe | 92% | stars now 1870 → est 5595 (range 5570-5620)
   https://github.com/mistralai/mistral-vibe
3) actionstatelabs/android-action-kernel | 91% | stars now 525 → est 2910 (range 2885-2935)
   https://github.com/actionstatelabs/android-action-kernel
4) Anionex/banana-slides | 91% | stars now 2458 → est 4135 (range 4107-4163)
   https://github.com/Anionex/banana-slides
5) PastKing/tgbot-verify | 91% | stars now 1034 → est 2586 (range 2561-2611)
   https://github.com/PastKing/tgbot-verify

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
